page.title: 06Events_ GUILDTOWN GALA
page.content: A Village Gala was held in the School Playing Field on Saturday, 8th June. It was an long and exciting day out for all the family. From 9am. all was preparation. Men were erecting the marquee for all the stalls, putting the nets up for the Seven_a_side Football, marking out the car park and laying out the sports equipment. Everything was coming into shape. At 12 noon cars were arriving even although the Gala was not due to start till 2pm. Soon there were people everywhere_ buying, selling, watching, doing. Kinrossie won the Football and Guildtown A team won the Mini_sports. Everyone was very tired by the end of the day but were pleased at raising over Â£800 despite the terrible weather there had been. The money was shared among all the local participant groups
